          <title>
            <string language="en">2D Graphic Design</string>
            <string language="es">Diseño gráfico 2D</string>
            <string language="ga">Dearadh Grafach 2T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">2D Graphisches Design</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">2D Conception Graphique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">2D Projeto Gráfico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">2D Disegno Grafico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">2D γραφικό σχέδιο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Description of how to approach this section of the JC Art project with student samples to support these ideas.</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción sobre la forma de afrontar esta sección del proyecto de arte del JC, con muestras de estudiantes para respaldar estas ideas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur síos ar an gcaoi le tabhairt faoin mhír seo de thionscadal ealaíne an Teastais Shóisearaigh le samplaí ó na daltaí chun tacú leis na smaointe seo.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaíon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung von, wie man diesem Kapitel des JC 
kunstprojektes mit Kursteilnehmerproben nähert, um diese Ideen zu 
unterstützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de la façon approcher cette section 
du projet d'art de JC avec des échantillons d'étudiant pour 
supporter ces idées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição de como aproximar esta seção do 
projeto da arte de JC com amostras do estudante para suportar estas 
idéias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione di come avvicinarsi a questa sezione 
del progetto di arte di JC con i campioni dell'allievo per sostenere 
queste idee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή για το πώς να πλησιάσει αυτό το τμήμα του 
προγράμματος τέχνης JC με τα δείγματα σπουδαστών για να 
υποστηριχθούν αυτές οι ιδέες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
